website_summaries.verdict: Infused with collagen, this serum makes an instant difference in your skin's appearance.
pros: A collagen and vitamin serum packed with a proprietary energy complex of CoQ10, superoxide dismutase, carnitine, and niacinamide
Brightens the skin and reduces dark spots and redness
Users also said the serum helped control oiliness and combat breakouts
cons: Some users noted an acidic smell

customer_reviews.title: The Best Vitamin C Serum I Have Tried
customer_reviews.text: After using up my bottle I switched to another company's Vitamin C suspension and I regret it. Most Vitamin C serums and lotions burn my skin, but this one feels so soothing. After a couple weeks of use, my skin felt more supple and breakouts were not as intense. The serum does not have a smell and comes in a very sanitary pump.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: not getting a rash
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for past year without a problem. This time I broke out in a tight dry scaly rash that took weeks to repair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Face
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have been using for about a year and have noticed my complexion much brighter, dark spots are lighter and gives a nice glow. The price is good too.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyred

customer_reviews.title: I does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for 3 weeks, hoping for it to work after spending all that money. It did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: camille robertson

customer_reviews.title: Used sold as new
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this serum and it’s very good but this came HALF EMPTY and without a protective seal
customer_reviews.author: Laura P

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm definately a fan of Dr Dennis Gross products and this one is no exception. Does what it says it will do.I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nooooo!
customer_reviews.text: Caused SEVERE reaction. Basically burned my skin off and left me with a terrible dry scaly rash for WEEKS. Needed trips to the dermatologist and Rx creams to fix. Don’t buy this if you have sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: kidd35

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my extremely sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday, extremely sensitive skin, but I have no issues using this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It gives my skin a natural glow
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So far I can’t comment on how the product works, I’ve not used it long enough and I’m not sure I will. The product feels to slimy and leave a sticky feeling to the face. I also think it does not allow for my moisturizer to go on smooth , and then leaves my foundation looking splotchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dr Dennis Gross
customer_reviews.text: Excellent my 3rd time. I do order from Dr Dennis Gross directly when sales but I receive much faster through Amazon that’s another reason I order through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Breuer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best one I've ever had! Notice the difference in a couple days, really works, wrinkles became invisible, skin is tighter and firmer, and its not even a week... can not wait to see my face and neck in a month... texture of the serum is very light, smells good, and feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 3 weeks and I can already tell the difference in redness on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: First time user of the C-Serum. Pleasant smell, absorbs quickly. I just recently received this product, so I haven’t seen any results yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dealz57

customer_reviews.title: NO CHANGE
customer_reviews.text: There was no change in my complexion from using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Irma A

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say good things about this product. I immediately saw a difference. It goes on easy and makes my skin feel so good.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T Nielson

customer_reviews.title: Great serum
customer_reviews.text: Great serum. After 3 weeks I do nothing less fine lines and increased firmness
customer_reviews.author: CYR

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for dry, flaky skin
customer_reviews.text: My facialist at Elizabeth Arden salon recommended this and I’ve been using it for about 2 months. I have dry skin and in my 60s. This product is fantastic. I apply this at night, and then apply a hydrating night cream. In the morning my skin is soft and dewy. What a difference from the red, flaking, dry skin i had before! Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: It arrived on time and in good condition. I think it has been helping my ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really liking this product. It arrived on time and in good condition. I think it has been helping my skin stay more hydrated since the colder drier air has started this season. I am looking forward to seeing how the results are after I use the full bottle. I have had this product for about two weeks now and use it twice daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could find the box to return. It was oxidized upon arrival. Vitamin c products should not be dark yellow to amber in color! Its incredibly sticky on my face as well. I will go back to using TImeless.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product, I noticed a change in my skin in a week!
customer_reviews.author: Colette Prime

customer_reviews.title: Not using long enough to judge.
customer_reviews.text: I like the textures of both products -- now waiting for positive results!
customer_reviews.author: Allegreta Behar-Blau

customer_reviews.title: feels hydrating brightens skin
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the negative reviews. I love Dr. Dennis Vitamin C serum. I use it every day before I moisturize. It feels hydrating and my skin looks more clear and bright. It is great stuff. Amazon's price is 30% lower than I pay on Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: knitter4years

product_meta.title: Dr. Dennis Gross C + Collagen Brighten & Firm Vitamin C Serum: for Dull Complexion, Wrinkles, Uneven Tone and Texture, 1.0 fl oz
product_meta.description: Dr. Dennis Gross C+ Collagen Brighten + Firm Vitamin C Serum is designed to combat dull tired looking skin.
feature_bullets: WHAT IT IS. This weightless, fast-absorbing gel-serum is power-packed with collagen amino acids plus our proprietary vitamin C (3-O C technology) and energy complex. Fuel cells for increased collagen production and accelerated repair to improve imperfections like dullness, dark spots, rough texture, and expression lines.

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU. Aging and environmental aggressors deplete energy, disrupting normal skin functions. This new energy-generating serum combines vitamin C with a unique complex that charges skin’s battery to keep it fit and tone.
CRUELTY-FREE. Vegan, Paraben-Free, and Cruelty-Free Formula. A power-packed, weightless gel serum that revitalizes dull, tired or aging skin.

REPAIR & PROTECT. Aging and environmental aggressors deplete energy, disrupting normal skin functions. This new energy generating serum combines vitamin C with a unique complex that charges skin’s battery to keep it fit and tone.

Dennis Gross, MD, is a board-certified dermatologist and dermatological surgeon who has been in practice for 25+ years. He is well-known for his expertise in skin health as well as his approach to creating and maintaining the most natural-looking skin utilizing state-of-the-art cosmetic treatments and dermatologic technology. Dr. Dennis Gross is a regular guest on shows including Dr. OZ, The Today Show, The Doctors, CBS: The Early Show, and CNN.
